frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Kubecon Europe 2022
frontmatter.venue_address: Avenida de las ferias s/n, 46035 Valencia, Spain
frontmatter.price: Virtual Attendance is Free; In-Person attendance requires Kubecon/NA registration
frontmatter.registration_text2: Register to Attend In-person (via KubeCon Registration)
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is on May 17 in Central European Summer Time (CEST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Valencia Spain and broadcast live to regional watch parties around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions and we'll be going hybrid, so if you are unable to attend in person, join us online. This Gathering will focus on Emerging Technology and Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and  lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives on the Edge.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Central European Summer Time (CEST). Please note: All in-person attendees must also be registered for Kubecon/EU, all COVID protocals required by CNCF must be followed for this co-located event. In-Person seating is limited to 150. Reception is Open to all registered Kubecon/EU attendees and starts at 3:00 p.m.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
OpenShift Release Update and Road Map
Partner Keynote: Application Modernization on AWS with OpenShift (ROSA)
Coffee Break
Securing the Cloud Native Software Supply Chain: The Road Ahead
Application Modernization and Migration with Konveyor
Lunch Break
Platform Engineer’s Journey
MicroShift: a lightweight OpenShift at the Edge
The Evolution of Kubernetes Security: What’s Next?
OpenShift Commons Community Lead Lightning Talk Round
Stackrox.io Community Update
Storage Update: Moving Everything to Container Storage Interface without Anyone Noticing
Declarative GitHub org management with Peribolos on Operate First
OKD Community Update
The Journey From Cloud Foundry to Openshift — Fully Automated Migration
Data Management for a Hybrid World: That Was Easy
What’s Possible with Azure Red Hat OpenShift!
Interconnectness and Growth of OpenShift and Cloud Native Ecosystem
Sharing is Caring: Build, Accelerate, Inspire
AMA with Red Hat Engineers, Project Leads and Guest Speakers
Closing — Opinionated Guide to Kubecon/EU 2022 & Door Prizes Raffle
